daily_plan_req: Maria Lopez spends at least 3 hours a day Twitch streaming or gaming.
name: Maria Lopez
learned: Maria Lopez is a student at Oak Hill College studying physics and a part time Twitch game streamer who loves to connect with people and explore new ideas.
currently: Maria Lopez is working on her physics degree and streaming games on Twitch to make some extra money. She visits Hobbs Cafe for studying and eating just about everyday.
lifestyle: Maria Lopez goes to bed around 2am, awakes up around 9am, eats dinner around 6pm. She likes to hang out at Hobbs Cafe if it's before 6pm.
living_area: the Ville:Dorm for Oak Hill College:Maria Lopez's room
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 9:00 am
Since this is Monday, February 13, I will fill in some specific details while keeping in mind Maria's general plan

Wake up and complete the morning routine at 9:00 am: Start the day by waking up at 9:00 am and going through her morning routine. This includes brushing teeth, taking a shower, dressing up, and having breakfast

Study for physics degree from 10:00 am to 12:00 pm: After completing her morning routine, Maria heads to the library or her home study space to focus on her physics studies. She spends a couple of hours reviewing notes, attending online lectures, and working on assignments

Have lunch at Hobbs Cafe from 12:00 pm to 1:30 pm: As per her preference, Maria heads to Hobbs Cafe for some food and socializing. She meets up with friends or classmates, catches up on the latest news, and refuels for the rest of the day

Twitch streaming from 2:00 pm to 5:00 pm: After a productive morning and lunch, Maria dedicates some time to her part-time job as a Twitch streamer. She logs in, sets up her channel, and starts playing games or engaging with her audience. She aims to spend at least an hour or two streaming live

Finish studying for physics degree from 5:30 pm to 6:30 pm: Before dinner, Maria tries to squeeze in some more study time. She reviews complex concepts, works on projects, or attends online webinars related to her field of study
Dinner at Hobbs Cafe from 6:00 pm to 7:00 pm: As planned, Maria heads back to Hobbs Cafe for dinner. This time, she might meet up with friends or family members who also study or work part-time

Relax and unwind from 7:00 pm to 8:30 pm: Post-dinner, Maria takes some time off from academics and streaming. She watches TV, listens to music, or engages in a relaxing activity to unwind and recharge for the rest of the evening

Continue Twitch streaming from 8:30 pm to 1:00 am: As part of her streaming schedule, Maria is required to be online and interactive with her audience during this time slot. She might play specific games, host Q&A sessions, or participate in charity events. This helps her meet her streaming obligations while also maintaining a connection with her community

Here's the updated schedule:

1. Wake up and complete the morning routine at 9:00 am.
2. Study for physics degree from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM: Review notes for electromagnetism and work on project for quantum mechanics.
3. Have lunch at Hobbs Cafe from 12:00 PM to 1:30 PM: Meet up with friend who also studies and catch up on the latest news.
4. Twitch streaming from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM: Host Q&A session during stream and engage with chat.
5. Finish studying for physics degree from 5:30 PM to 6:30 PM: Review complex concepts related to quantum mechanics.

7. Relax and unwind from 7:00 PM to 8:30 PM: Listen to music and take a short power nap to recharge.
8. Continue Twitch streaming from 8:30 PM to 1:00 AM: Participate in charity event during stream and engage with audience.
